wikipedia_page.main: Thomas McCarthy  (1868 in Wales – ) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team, playing 1 match on 27 April 1889 against Ireland.At club level, he played for Wrexham in the 1880s.

response: Thomas McCarthy (also Tom and Tommy) may refer to:
*J. Thomas McCarthy (born 1937), American educator, author and attorney
*Thomas McCarthy (Syracuse politician) (1786–1848), businessman and political figure from Syracuse, New York
*Thomas McCarthy (Canadian politician) (1832–1870), Quebec businessman and political figure
